LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.0.label: high on morphine
LanguageData.MorphineHigh.stages.0.description: Morphine really kills pain, which is great around here.
LanguageData.MorphineWithdrawal.stages.1.label: morphine withdrawal
LanguageData.MorphineWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm freezing and sweating. Everything hurts and my heart is palpitating.
